text: "No Vaseline" is a 1991 rap song from Ice Cube. The single is about fights in N.W.A. Ice Cube fights back toward N.W.A members. The song was released on October 29, 1991. Not long after the release, Dr. Dre left his group because he was not getting money. Category:1991 songs Category:Diss tracks
title: No Vaseline
